title: AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Project Technical Support Post
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Delhi (AIIMS Delhi) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Technical Support Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree Post post-graduation can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply...
